title: Senior Houdini Technical Director
summary: Apple’s Human Interface VFX team designs product experiences, from early ideation all the way through to the shipping product. To ensure high-quality results, we work closely with other HI design teams, software teams, graphics engineers and product marketing.
description: We are in search of a Senior Houdini Technical Director to help us achieve the highest levels of photorealism in our designs. Using Houdini's procedural toolkit, you will be at the forefront of crafting complex shaders/materials, dynamic simulations, and artist-friendly tools for geometric optimization. The ideal candidate thrives in a dynamic, collaborative setting, constantly exploring the limits of next-generation technology and procedural content creation.
key_qualifications:
10+ of production experience in procedural modeling, geometry processing & optimization, dynamic simulation and HDA generation for feature films, advertising or AAA games
Mastery in manipulating physical dynamics and lighting to achieve lifelike imagery through Houdini's node-based workflow
Demonstrated ability to build complex, procedural network graphs that are easy to follow
Expertise in developing advanced shading networks in Houdini, utilizing geometry data and math operations with an eye to realtime experiences
Proficiency in working with renderers such as Mantra, Karma, Arnold, or V-Ray, and familiarity with Solaris and USD composition
Versatility in adapting content for various platforms, from high-end renderings to real-time assets, without compromising quality
Exceptional communication skills, capable of leading collaborative efforts across departments
Independent and driven, with a keen ability to adapt to new tools and workflows
Reel required
education_experience: BA/BFA in Digital Media, Visual Effects, Animation, or a related field, or equivalent professional experience
additional_requirements:
Proficiency in VEX and Python scripting for automation and tool development.
Solid understanding of other DCC tools
Experience working with external art teams and outsource partners
Strong leadership and mentoring abilities and interpersonal skills
Ability to find creative solutions for technically challenging tasks
pay_benefits:

The base pay range for this role is between $166,600 and $250,600, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location.
